name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: I purchased a single product on Christmas after receiving an Amazon gift card. I expected delays knowing the time of year, but it came within two days which was super quick; The shirt also fit perfectly. Overall comfortable and stylish design, nothing bad too say. Cheers

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Love this

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Had to return this as it was far too small. Also, the material felt a little scratchy, less soft and comfortable than other Champion t shirts that I have. Return policy excellent and overall my experience was positive, deducting one star for material.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: For my oldest son, he absolutely loved it as is true to size and great quality.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Love my new tee. It is made of a comfortable, easy wear fabric. Love the vivid colour. Recommended.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Trust me guys I like my shirts loose im xxl and they fit me right usually but this shirt is way to big get a size down besides that it’s great

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: I wear these for the gym. I  reordered the same t-shirt style except in size large instead of medium.The large is pretty long in the body and arms but they fit well and cover my stomach when my arms lift over my head which is what I wanted and are a little bit loose-fitting which is fine.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: I’ll buy again when on special.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Cheap, but feels good quality with only subtitle logo ( which I like). Wrinkles allot after wash, maybe due to good quality cotton material. I brought this for casual wear, so can’t be bothered ironing. Normally just a quick steam, but that didn’t do much. Maybe I am too low quality for the shirt?

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Perfect t-shirt for playing sport in.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Feels nice

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Great shirt good fit solid neck line washed well great price

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Low quality and bad fit. Bought small, I'm a small in almost every brand, however this was wayyy too small. Fabric was very thin as well. Don't rate it and returned. Pretty poor champion product, as I love their reverse weave hoodies - I have 5 of them!

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Really short - if you have any torso length it's not going to fit.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Awful fit, baggy saggy neck and a raggy feel. Not worth the money

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: I gave these to my husband as a gift. He's very picky when it comes to clothes, but these he liked a lot! Fabric's comfortable, and the fit is great too.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: I'm around 5'7" and bought a medium. Fits perfectly.Shirt thickness is average and feels nice

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Price paid for was reasonable. Disappointingly. colour of the T-Shirt faded after just 2 washes.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: My hoodies is L and is snug.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Worst quality a fit ever. Do not buy

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Way bigger then sizing chart indicated, return costs more than the shirt did, so now I’m stuck with it, not happy

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Item is perfect fit

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: It’s ok just, not good quality but for work and yard work yes, not for going out!

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Great quality t-shirt but the sizing is smaller than the typical sizing on other t-shirts.I'm a size Medium and quite slim (6ft and weigh 66kg).I find these t-shirts quite tight fitting, shorter on the arms and the length only just covers the waistband of my shorts.I've never had to order a size larger but with these t-shirts I really do need too.The material is great quality and they're really well made. It's just a shame about the sizing for me.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Not sure whats up with all the 5 star reviews. The product I was sent was horrible quality with super itchy and thin fabric, ive bought shirts for half the price that were much better quality. Sent it straight back for a refund.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: The item is too small for a teenager, so I wanted to return it. But returning from the UK to the US is expensive, so I couldn't return it. Waste of money.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: El algodón de la playera es buenísimo, súper suave, es difícil encontrarlo.No raspa nada absolutamente.Fue regalo para hombre no muy alta (1,67m)  le quedó bien, el estilo es suelto, no ajustado, lo cual para una persona de 45 años es muy cómoda.La recomiendo mucho.Excelente precio y calidad.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Bought it for my hubby and he found it very comfortable and roomy for home wear
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 January 2019

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: I'm maybe one size bigger around the waist than I should be but it's still a bit tighter at the waist than I'd likeSlim fitting for sure

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Brilliant service

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: These T shirts are comfortable, the right thickness and easy to care.Some T shirts are just uncomfortable to wear against the body.  They are usually 100% synthetic and they feel like you're wearing a plastic garbage bag.  They entice you to buy them with low prices.This T shirt is super comfortable.  It has the right blend of cotton and polyester so that it feels good on the skin, is not super thin so it has the right warmth for a T shirt, does not shrink, and is mostly wrinkle free.And they look good.  I'm 5'8" and weigh about 170 pounds, and I like my T shirts to fit loosely but not look like a tent.  XXL fits perfectly for me.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Bought this for my 24 year old son. He really liked it. The royal blue color was really nice...a bit different shade. He's got a husky build and the xl fit comfortably. I bought it in the burgundy color for Christmas since he liked it so much. Great price!

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Another great deal from Champion. Feels great and fits well. Logo stitched on is a nice touch. Great price at $17 for a quality t shirt.

reviews: Buena calidad, esperemos a ver cuántas lavadas aguanta.

reviews: the shirt is great in quality and has 0 flaws. Sometimes it is annoying to have cats because otherwise id be wearing this everyday.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Bought for my son. Good Fit for 174cm & 70 kg guy. Color & material is acceptable. He likes it.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: You just put this thing on.. it fits and feels great.. and you go out or lounge at home completely at ease. I liked the first two so much and I went ahead and bought eight more and a couple of repeat colors. These t-shirts also look much higher quality than the $10 or $11 that I paid for them. I look so urbane driving around in my 2-door Jeep Wrangler. I am now thinking of getting a few more for a couple of family members and a couple of close friends when I travel to India next time.

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: This is a great shirt. True to size. I highly recommend this shirt. It would make a great gift. The price when I got it was perfect 🥰 highly recommend, a great buy

name: Champion Men's Classic Jersey
reviews: Wunderbar
